testcase.name: Buyer fails to complete the purchase due to missing or invalid details - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Buyer landing to ecommercee...........................................passed Given Buyer logs in to SauceDemo using username standard_user and password secret_sauce.passed When Buyer adds Sauce Labs Backpack to the cart, goes to the cart page......passed And Buyer proceeds to checkout Sauce Labs Backpack..........................passed And Buyer enters shipping details: , Doe, 12345.............................passed Then Buyer sees an error message Error: First Name is required..............passed
